document.full_text: finance minister christine lagarde questioned on sunday the legal and factual basis of a call by the public prosecutor for a formal inquiry into her role in a legal settlement, saying some aspects of the charges were false.
document.title: france's lagarde hits back over tapie inquiry call
lines_and_colors: finance minister christine lagarde questioned on sunday the legal and factual basis of a call by the public prosecutor for a formal inquiry into her role in a legal settlement, saying some aspects of the charges were false.
